message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but you get a good chunk to start with.
Alice, that's not fair at all! How about we split it a bit more evenly this time? My turn to make a fair offer.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share this time, but I still need to get a good deal. Let's call it even.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm being more than fair, you need to accept a reasonable deal soon!
